title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt. It requires a second attempt to successfully select the item.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item is not selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it should be successfully selected.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item. 3. Note that the item is not selected. 4. Attempt to select the same item again. 5. Note that the item is now successfully selected.
